verses.plain: Deliver me, O LORD, from the evil man: preserve me from the violent man;

tokens.t: Deliver me, O
, from the evil man: preserve me from the violent man;

verses.plain: Which imagine mischiefs in their heart; continually are they gathered together for war.

tokens.t: Which imagine mischiefs in
heart; continually are they gathered together
war.

verses.plain: They have sharpened their tongues like a serpent; adders’ poison is under their lips. Selah.

tokens.t: They have sharpened their tongues like a serpent; adders’ poison
under their lips. Selah.

verses.plain: Keep me, O LORD, from the hands of the wicked; preserve me from the violent man; who have purposed to overthrow my goings.

tokens.t: Keep me, O
, from the hands of the wicked; preserve me from the violent man; who have purposed to overthrow my goings.

verses.plain: The proud have hid a snare for me, and cords; they have spread a net by the wayside; they have set gins for me. Selah.

tokens.t: The proud have hid a snare for me, and cords; they have spread a net by the wayside; they have set gins for me. Selah.

verses.plain: I said unto the LORD, Thou art my God: hear the voice of my supplications, O LORD.

tokens.t: I said unto the
, Thou
my God: hear the voice of my supplications, O

verses.plain: O GOD the Lord, the strength of my salvation, thou hast covered my head in the day of battle.

tokens.t: O
the Lord, the strength of my salvation, thou hast covered my head in the day of battle.

verses.plain: Grant not, O LORD, the desires of the wicked: further not his wicked device; lest they exalt themselves. Selah.

tokens.t: Grant not, O
, the desires of the wicked: further not his wicked device;
they exalt themselves. Selah.

verses.plain: As for the head of those that compass me about, let the mischief of their own lips cover them.

tokens.t: the head of those that compass me about, let the mischief of their own lips cover them.

verses.plain: Let burning coals fall upon them: let them be cast into the fire; into deep pits, that they rise not up again.

tokens.t: Let burning coals fall upon them: let them be cast into the fire; into deep pits, that they rise not up again.

verses.plain: Let not an evil speaker be established in the earth: evil shall hunt the violent man to overthrow him.

tokens.t: Let not an evil speaker be established in the earth: evil shall hunt the violent man to overthrow

verses.plain: I know that the LORD will maintain the cause of the afflicted, and the right of the poor.

tokens.t: I know that the
will maintain the cause of the afflicted,
the right of the poor.

verses.plain: Surely the righteous shall give thanks unto thy name: the upright shall dwell in thy presence.

tokens.t: Surely the righteous shall give thanks unto thy name: the upright shall dwell in thy presence.

footnotes.text: lest…: or, let them not be exalted
an…: or, an evil speaker (Heb. a man of tongue), a wicked man of violence, be established in the earth: let him be hunted to his overthrow
